lines.text: As for you, Despera ... and all of you! This is the last time I hire any of your relatives!!
[Ryan, Kaitlin, and J.B. are turned into young children]
[J.B. is being heavily damaged by Skugs during battle]

[shouts]
Ryan! Kaitlin! Better hurry! I don't have much juice left!
[J.B. is lying on the ground, terribly wounded]

[shouts]
J.B.! Are you okay? Can you move?

[groaning]
These Skugs sure pack a wallop. Guess I need a recharge.
[she gets him up on his feet]
[there is a picture of a boy and a girl joining hands together, and a star forms between the hands; the next sequence has Kaitlin and J.B. choreographing the moves]
[both hands are joined together, and her eye lights turn on, while her other lights flash]
[the blasts of her light energy course into J.B.'s body, healing him]
[J.B. is informed that Ryan has rescued the puppies]
Thanks! Now to head back before...
[each Skug takes off its own head and kicks it onto the ground; the heads explode, heavily damaging J.B.]
Forces of darkness, empower me! / Take me back to my virtual reality!
